title: Beer: Challenging Problems in Probability and Statistics
description: A collection of challenging problems in probability and statistics, with solutions and discussions.

items.title: The Sock Drawer
items.content_html: 一个抽屉里装有红袜子和黑袜子。当随机抽取两只袜子时，两只袜子都是红色的概率为1/2. (a) 抽屉里的袜子数量最少可以是多少？ (b) 如果黑袜子的数量是偶数，最少可以是多少？

items.title: About Beer
items.content_html: Beer: Challenging Problems in Probability and Statistics
